title: Recharge Plans, DTH Plans, Offers, Cashback
description:
iReff is the most trusted brand in India when it comes to prepaid mobile recharge information. App provides many value added services like live balance, Recharge reminder, online recharge options etc for all telecom operators covering all circles in India. DTH plans are also available now!
Mobile Recharge Assistant:
Before you recharge your prepaid mobile, find the best recharge plan/pack for your exact need. iReff app is the fastest and easiest way to find the recharge plan you need and buy it through our online recharge partners. Browse through the common benefit categories - Topup, SMS, Data (4G/3G/2G), Local, STD, ISD. Or try the powerful full-text search feature to find recharge plans matching your specific need or for price/plan comparison.
Mobile plan description shows FTT, Extra talk time(Full TT+), Local, STD, 2G, 3G, 4G, Roaming, NIGHT packs, Validity plans, Recharge type, Self Activation codes, FRCs and a Special warning to alert users for conditional recharges.
DTH recharge with exciting deals available for Tata Sky, Airtel DTH, Dish TV, Reliance Big TV DTH, Videocon D2H & Sun TV DTH. It also supports DTH activation & online recharge option.
You can also find commonly used USSD / SMS codes for checking the balance and remaining benefits. Want to contact the operator customer care? We got that covered too.
Find all latest tariff plans for all networks/operators, Find latest Reliance Jio recharge offers and plans details here.
Get amazing discounts and cash back on all recharge transactions & much more.
Mobile Recharge Plans:
You can find details about Topup Vouchers, Special Tariff Vouchers (STV), Combo Vouchers and Full Talk Time offers. If you are looking for plans to help a friend, just share it from the app in a beautiful format. Mobile retailers also find it very useful to answer customer recharge queries.
Manage Mobile Subscription:
We maintain your complete recharge history in one place and remind you when it is time to recharge. Users can also check the live balance of talk time and can track consumption. Reliance Jio users can track data balance all the time.
Recharge plan data is updated daily for all operators, based on what is published on the operator website.
Mobile Online Recharge:
Buy the selected recharge plan through our online recharge partner Paytm. Apart from changing list of recharge options, you can also get all the latest cashback offers for recharge & personal offers in the app.
Save Money, Make Money!
★ All plans are shown sorted by value so users can pick the best!, Users can also sort all plans by relevance (default), Validity and Price. Users can also compare plans and find the best plans for their usage pattern.
★ Mobile Recharge Offers, promo codes, Coupons available from our partners Paytm, Mobikwik & others.
★ Offers: Personal offers section under Offers will show SIM personal offers from the operator. Recharge Offers: All our recharge partner offers from Paytm is shown here.
★ Deals: We are showing some of the popular online deals for mobile devices, accessories & popular categories.
We currently support information across all applicable telecom circles for:
* Airtel
* Aircel
* BSNL / MTNL
* Idea
* Reliance Jio
* MTS
* Reliance 4G
* Reliance GSM
* Tata Docomo GSM
* Tata Docomo CDMA
* T24
* Uninor
* Vodafone
We are continuously making improvements and feature additions. Please keep your app updated to the latest version. In case of any problems or suggestions please email us at care@ireff.in
For all help related to app and features refer to  http://help.ireff.in
The app may show ads from Facebook. See https://m.facebook.com/ads/ad_choices for more details. Clicking on such ads will not give you any reward whatsoever.
This app uses Accessibility services.
